xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 07 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 13:23 <nclandrei> has joined #phenotips 13:23 <nclandrei> hi everyone :) 13:23 <sdumitriu> Hi nclandrei 13:23 <nclandrei> how are things going? 13:24 <sdumitriu> Same as always 13:24 <sdumitriu> Slowly taking over the world 13:26 <nclandrei> hahaha 13:26 <nclandrei> at least that sounds good 13:27 <nclandrei> I am also working on the application, it starts to look better 13:30 <akats> Is there really not a single file in PhenomeCentral.org that implements Patient? 13:31 <sdumitriu> Really 13:31 <sdumitriu> That's just a collection of documents mostly 13:43 <sdumitriu> akats: #770 also mentions external_id 13:47 <akats> I see. Your comment was a little misleading. I though you didn't want to implement the external id. 13:47 <sdumitriu> No, that's how you should do it 14:13 <akats> I have a question for you https://gist.github.com/soLEED/9417748 14:20 <sdumitriu> akats: Answered 14:21 <akats> Thank you 14:44 <sdumitriu> akats: Don't forget the phenotips pull 14:44 <akats> Hm... I opened it 14:47 <sdumitriu> Right... 15:02 <SayAsh> has quit 15:04 <mcupak> has quit 15:10 <dvkmail> has joined #phenotips 15:16 <sdumitriu> akats: Don't forget to rewrite getId in patient-network 15:18 <sdumitriu> akats: You could get inspiration for javadocs from the JSON description 15:18 <sdumitriu> (the google doc) 15:19 <akats> ok 15:26 <sdumitriu> akats: I've assigned a few more issues to you 15:30 <akats> ok 15:52 <dvkmail> has quit 16:21 <akats> regarding issue https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/578: I found the spot where the rights are being recreated. However it appears that they are recreated on purpose. Can you tell me what that purpose is? https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/blob/master/components/patient-access-rules/api/src/main/java/org/phenotips/data/permissions/internal/RightsUpdateEventListener.java#L108 16:22 <sdumitriu> akats: There's no reason 16:22 <sdumitriu> It was the quickest implementation 16:22 <sdumitriu> But the behavior is wrong 16:22 <sdumitriu> That's what the issue is about 16:23 <sdumitriu> Make it so that rigths aren't cleared, but updated 16:23 <akats> ok 16:49 <akats> Should the rights object be updated on each save even if it has not changed, or should I write in mechanisms to prevent that completely 16:50 <akats> I'm assuming the latter 16:52 <sdumitriu> I don't think it matters 16:53 <sdumitriu> You can just update every time, if the actual data doesn't change, there's no extra work for XWiki, it always saves all objects anyway 16:55 <nclandrei> I am leaving, see you! 16:55 <nclandrei> has quit 17:09 <akats> Can I modify the default XWiki.XWikiRights class as part of the solution? 17:09 <sdumitriu> No 17:10 <akats> Could I add an extra field to the new XWiki.XwikiRights object that gets created? 17:11 <sdumitriu> No, why? 17:11 <sdumitriu> What are you trying to do? 17:18 <sdumitriu> akats: http://maven.xwiki.org/site/docs/xwiki-javadoc-5.0.x/com/xpn/xwiki/doc/XWikiDocument.html#getXObject%28org.xwiki.model.reference.DocumentReference,%20java.lang.String,%20java.lang.String,%20boolean%29 17:58 <fabiocba> has quit 18:04 <IonelPopescu> has quit 18:13 <akats> has quit 18:34 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 18:41 <konoval> has joined #phenotips 18:46 <blink2> has quit 19:28 <fabiocba> has quit 21:03 <IonelPopescu> has quit 21:05 <valsoft> has quit 22:48 <IonelPopescu> has joined #phenotips 23:21 <IonelPopescu> has quit
